website_summaries.verdict: An affordable tire that comes in a variety of sizes and provides less rolling resistance on paved surfaces than the competition.
pros: The subtle tread allows the tire to roll smoothly over minor bumps and rocks
Comes in a wide variety of colors for a personalized look
cons: Poor traction performance on loose terrain

customer_reviews.title: Not well made, but look good.
customer_reviews.text: Put these only son's GT BMX. He really likes them. Better than the stock tires that cost more. Update 5/22/17: Never had a bicycle tire rip on the side wall, causing my son to blow the tube and wreck. See picture. I take back the good review. This bike was not rode during winter, these tires are not the old. Will not purchase this brand, again.
customer_reviews.author: EricR.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the tires on child's bike. Quality of tire seems really good. My daughter noticed that it was easier and faster to ride than the previous tire (less rolling resistance). Had not issues with packaging or delivery. The quality of materials and construction is fine. The tire itself is mainly for road/sidewalk as the tire is more smooth and without studs. It seemed to go on wet pavement just fine.
customer_reviews.author: H. Kim

customer_reviews.title: nice tread as well
customer_reviews.text: Redid an 86 GT Performer in Dayglo Orange....these tires took it over the top!!..nice tread as well!
customer_reviews.author: Hal Owen

customer_reviews.title: stays white
customer_reviews.text: I was extremely surprised that my son wanted white tires, but they do look great on his all black bike and on his blue bike, they make his bike stand out from the others, and the tires do stay relatively white as well after a lot of use.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Karkhoff

customer_reviews.title: Working fine
customer_reviews.text: June 1 2019 Red! And round too, which we prefer ;-) So far, a normal-wear tire. We're using it for introduction to BMX freestyle riding in the hot hot Arizona weather. To be forthright, we've had cool weather so far ... more in October! Sept 1 2019 Sold the bike. Did fine during BMX training.
customer_reviews.author: David Jackemeyer

customer_reviews.title: Good color.
customer_reviews.text: Look great on my vintage dyno. Colors are great. No problems with falling apart yet as others have had. I will update if I have any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a mid school Mongoose that had seen better days. I really like the tires so far, they appear to be good quality and shipping was actually pretty fast.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Lepley

customer_reviews.title: Good for a kids bicycle...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a child's bicycle and they work great. However, I would buy something nicer for a true BMX bike. The rubber compound didn't feel high-quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Kline

customer_reviews.title: Very good grip, and this is a very large diameter for 16" tire
customer_reviews.text: My son's riding confidence increased significantly with these tires comparing to stock 16" Specialized HotRock tires. After a couple of weeks he started experimenting with riding up 6" curbs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Chimirev

customer_reviews.title: A great upgrade from my slick-like tires
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tires in hopes to improve my handling and traction. I am using them on a folding bicycle which came with tires that were amost slicks. They are a vast improvement! Not perfect but better than I expected. They were easy to install and work well on urban streets where there is debris and also do alright in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: PL Kagan

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking tire but would not work for my bicycle ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking tire but would not work for my bicycle the tire I needed was a nylon bead s7 type witch these were not
customer_reviews.author: jesse moran

customer_reviews.title: really good tires
customer_reviews.text: these are really good tires and i strongly recommend buying these. i have red rims on my bmx bike and these completely match the rims and it does skid and make red marks on the road but not as much as you would think but these are really good tires and i am planning on buying some more in the future
customer_reviews.author: RAG3_-1

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Ordered
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace a tire on my daughters 20" bike. I tried a couple local shops and found that I could pay the price I wanted, but would have to settle for a black tire, or pay a LOT more for a white, matching, tire. Being frustrated with those answers, I decided to check Amazon. I was happy to find both requirements met with this tire. There were no surprises. I was emailed when the tire was sent, it was packaged well, and the tire has been happily spinning on the bike for about a month now. A good tire at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. Good tread. My son has been riding on it for a few days now. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trailer I pull behind my bicycle. These tires are perfect. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: animalangel1

customer_reviews.title: Nice tires
customer_reviews.text: Bought these new tires for my 11yr old son's bike. can't complain, he's happy!
customer_reviews.author: william cosme

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great set of tires that are hard to find.Fit+Slipped on easily.
customer_reviews.author: Mikes Bicycle+E-Bike Repairs,98683Top Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Good tires. My son has used them
customer_reviews.text: Good tires. My son has used them. They do what they say and that's good enough for me. He's had them on his bike for a month or so now and we haven't had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking tires. They're blue.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my son's bike. He wanted to change up the colors on the bike and he likes these. He says he is trying not to skid because he doesn't want to wear down his tires... If he likes 'em, I like em. They went on easily and they're not too much out of round.
customer_reviews.author: TK

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for a kids bike
customer_reviews.text: Great tire for a kids bike. Grips the road much better than the cheap ones we replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Good tires
customer_reviews.text: Bought these tires for a pocket bike. So far very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used on a 1976 Huffy boys bike. Tough and durable tires. Tires are rugged.
customer_reviews.author: clinton Allen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to mount. The orange color is a bright as the picture. Shipped nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Taylor 7

customer_reviews.title: Street Tire
customer_reviews.text: Nice tire. Exactly as pictured. Good quality. Shipped fast. Very good price. I ride 90% pavement so it is perfect tread.
customer_reviews.author: Justin D. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great tires!
customer_reviews.text: Love these tires!! I’ve had them for almost a month and they run great! Also has fast shipping took about 5 days
customer_reviews.author: Ezequiel Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: It would be nice if u can reimburse me money for the faulty merchandise u sold me but oh well
customer_reviews.text: One the tires had a whole in it I patched it but when you pay 50$ for two new tires they should st least hold air...I am new to this& have no clue how to return them but i wish I could've cuz I found em way cheaper than I paid 2 days later
customer_reviews.author: DaVapa

customer_reviews.title: Good tire
customer_reviews.text: Put on my sun ez cruiser recumbent bike. Good tire, been riding on it for a while. Would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Dr Burke

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Description
customer_reviews.text: Nice tires *please note price is per tire. My mistake not theres when ordering quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Leda Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Nice tires for kids bikes...can't seem to find these locally.
customer_reviews.author: Hulio

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of tread on the tire and it looks good on my recumbent
customer_reviews.author: charles stansberry

customer_reviews.title: Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I didn't give these tires five stars is the fact I haven't had them on my kids bike very long.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. K

customer_reviews.title: good tire and nice to have some color choices
customer_reviews.text: its a Orange tire how could you go wrong, works like you would expect and goes well with a color matched bike
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy26

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 but 1 had a bulge.
customer_reviews.text: They look like nice tires. 1 had a bulge. Maybe from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Von

customer_reviews.title: Just like I thought
customer_reviews.text: They are strong and bright red tires. Just like I thought. They are up there with the best quality tires. At a better price though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: this item has met my expectations. but I only wish it didn't take so long to et to my house. probably an error, but as long as it got here unharmed. I'm okay with it. 4star!!
customer_reviews.author: Cezar Barajas

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. How well and how long they last remains to be seen.
customer_reviews.author: stephen u

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Good cheap tire for a kids bike Looks ok and no problems during install
customer_reviews.author: Humbucking strat

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, affordable bicycle tire
customer_reviews.text: Bought this tire for my daughter's bicycle that needed the rear tire replaced. Really like the tread design (this is a directional tread) and it looks and performs great. Highly recommend this tire and seller.
customer_reviews.author: CHAD CROUSE

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer-Product Met Expectations
customer_reviews.text: Product received matched order exactly and fit very well. I would buy from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Jason S.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: They are a so cool! The color is so vibrant and looks great on the bike. They are very wel made!
customer_reviews.author: zanettej

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: They got here quicker than promised and they were the right size and color! Can't ask for more than that! Thank you! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great ride!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the cheap Kendas that came with my folder with these. They are really sticky on corners and roll quietly. Handling really improved at a great price. They easily take 60 psi, so they are fast on pavement, but can run safely much lower if you are on gravel.
customer_reviews.author: Fred K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these tires and will bye again came here fast too
customer_reviews.author: bryton flyinghawk

customer_reviews.title: The tires wouldn't fit around my solid tubes. I ...
customer_reviews.text: The tires wouldn't fit around my solid tubes. I tried to return them, but beware you have to pay return shipping, which costs more than the tires cost. As far as quality, I wouldn't know. I couldn't ever get them on the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Gaylynn Martinson

customer_reviews.title: Not as thick as I would have hoped but my ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as thick as I would have hoped but my son loves the color so I guess that's all that matters.
customer_reviews.author: PJ

customer_reviews.title: The tires look AWESOME. Im happy with the outcome
customer_reviews.text: I bought the red and black ones for my son. The tires look AWESOME. Im happy with the outcome. Money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: QUINONES. T

customer_reviews.title: Boom!
customer_reviews.text: Horrible Tiress, a simple bunny hop made the tire blowout,! What a POS
customer_reviews.author: Cody

customer_reviews.title: great looks good
customer_reviews.text: it was just what i expected made bike look good tires took a little bit longer than expected to arrive but they finally got to my house
customer_reviews.author: gilberto

customer_reviews.title: I decided to try them one more time anyway..
customer_reviews.text: I bought these kendas before and I don't know why but they had a thump to them...These bike supply houses are stacking them flat on top of each other or something but- they keep coming flatened out for one thing, then- they don't seal correctly on the rims...not sure why...so..I gave them the benifit of the doubt cause i really wanted some white and some red color tires for a couple BMX builds i have coming up...I just tried the red ones and there thumping like crazy again!!! NOW I learned my lesson...i wouldn't buy more, i wouldn't recommend them to anyone... one star...that's being nyce!
customer_reviews.author: Wildbillo68

product_meta.title: SUNLITE Freestyle BMX Kontact Tires
product_meta.description:
Park/street tire, with directionally grooved tacky tread.

• Type: Freestyle
• Size: 16 x 1.75"
• Bead: Wire
• PSI: 40-65

Brand: Sunlite
